author: Hemant Mehta
title: A Response to a Religious Apologist Who Says Atheism is a Disease
text:
March 4, 2017 by Hemant Mehta Leave a Comment 
YouTuber Alex J. O’Connor (a.k.a. CosmicSkeptic ) does a nice job responding to an old video of a man who says atheism is a disease . 
These video rebuttals are genuinely helpful, even if they come years after the original video came out. They expose new people to old arguments (that never really went away) in a modern voice. Many of the arguments for and against God are roughly the same as they’ve ever been — but we always have new ways to debate, discuss, and share them. More power to Alex and anyone else who attempts to refute these religious claims.
